text: The Bradley Transportation Company, was an American shipping company that was a subsidiary of the Michigan Limestone and Chemical Company and handled its shipment of limestone to its parent company U.S. Steel. It boasted a large fleet of self-unloading lakers that were ordered specifically for the company. The Bradley Trans Co. was later merged with the U.S. Steel Great Lakes Fleet during the early 1980s. ==History== ==References== Category:Transportation companies of the United States
